name: Warlord: Attrition
description:
A once peaceful kingdom has come under siege. The King you have pledged your loyalty to has been murdered. The realm is plunged into chaos. Your enemies conspire to upend the peaceful realm. Can you unite the lords to expel the invaders and disrupt their evil plot?

Warlord: Attrition is a strategy and role playing blend set in a fantasy medieval period. The game features a unique story and tactical elements the player must utilize to win.



  • Blended Strategic and role playing elements, which provides a unique experience
  • Recruit officers to your cause and expand your forces
  • Upgrade officer skills and outfit them with unique abilities
  • Recruit lances to each officer to enlarge your forces
  • Unique skill trees
  • Challenging enemy AI, which will require strategic and tactical decisions to defeat
  • Decapitated units bounce around like chickens
  • Steam achievements

Credits:
  • Music by Punch Deck
  • Paint Stroke art by Mercury Code
